name: Cosimo
description:
Through a narrative Platformer, you play as Cosimo Piovasco di Rondò, a baron living in the 18th century who decides to take shelter in the trees and never touch the ground again, after an argument with his family.
Explore the surrounding forests to learn more about your story, interact with different characters but be careful not to touch the ground or you'll be turned into dust and lost in the wind!

The game is a practical application of the play-oriented principles detected in Italo Calvino's work and makes it possible to show the structural convergence existing between the Calvinian literature and video games.
Thus, each gameplay element comes from narrative fragments forming a playful system within the work

Game sumbmited for the Scientific Game Jam 2020.
Based on Italo Calvino's novel, The Baron in the trees.
